name: Upward Digital LLC
tag_list: monetization, sales-strategy, advertising, revenue, content, original-programming, branded-content, brand-advertising
overview:
Upward Digital LLC works with online publishers and content creators to create ad strategies and solutions that attract premium ad revenue. Upward Digital LLC provides strategic consulting, market positioning guidance, materials and presentation development, ad products creation, creative services, and ad sales representation.

Upward Digital LLC is currently providing services to clients of all sizes and platforms, from small and mid-sized online and mobile publishers, to global media brands. Upward Digital LLC also is expert in helping start-up clients develop a solid marketing foundation to attract seed or VC investment funds.
